title: U.S. urges Syria's Assad to step down
description: ISTANBULï¼Œ June 7 (Xinhua) -- U.S. Secretary of State Hillary Clinton Thursday urged Syrian President Bashar al-Assad to transfer his power to Syrians.
cleanContent: ISTANBUL, June 7 (Xinhua) -- U.S. Secretary of State Hillary Clinton Thursday urged Syrian President Bashar al-Assad to transfer his power to Syrians.Clinton said that Syria can not be safe until Assad goes.She said the U.S. will continue to mount pressure on the Syrian government politically and economically.She made the statement at a press conference on the sideline of the two-day Global Counterterrorism Forum in Istanbul.																																																																								|  |
